content.raw:
I did receive an error upon shutdown: 

```
ruby: /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:113: void boost::recursive_mutex::lock(): Assertion `!pthread_mutex_lock(&m)' failed.
```

that I haven’t yet seen before.  Unfortunately I wasn’t in debug so I didn’t get a stacktrace but will continue trying to replicate the error.
